content:
A friend from Gent, with talent and flair
Designer extraordinaire, with visions to share
Through your agency Blent Media, you lead the way
Creating designs that are fresh and new every day

But there's something new, you should know
A tool that can help, in ways you'll grow
Chat GPT is its name, so clever and smart
A technology, that sets it apart

With every word you type, it can keep up
An AI tool, to fill your creative cup
No more writer's block, no more dismay
Just tell it what you want to say

It will write with ease, and grace
A tool for all, in any place
So my dear friend, don't be left behind
Give Chat GPT a try, you'll find

It will open doors, and help you soar
An AI tool, that you'll adore
For your designs, it will be a treasure
Helping you to create, beyond measure.
